```{r}
#| message: FALSE
#| label: setup

library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
#| message: FALSE
#| label: readin

x <- read_csv(file = "data/mass-tracts.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
#| message: FALSE
#| label: plot

x |> ggplot(aes(x = med_income)) + geom_density(alpha = 0.5, aes(fill = race)) + theme_minimal() + scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format())
```
